EmailTemplate.name: POST FILING – Request to Correct Info on a Submitted Application
EmailTemplate.subject: Copyright Registration – Correction Requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are writing to inform you that information relating to the Copyright registration application for [INSERT TITLE], Case # [INSERT CASE #], was submitted incorrectly. Please update the application to reflect the correct information.
The information was submitted as:
[INSERT INCORRECT INFORMATION]
However, this information should be corrected to:
[INSERT CORRECTED INFORMATION]
If you have any questions, comments or concerns, please direct them to [INSERT CUSTOMER NAME] at [INSERT CUSTOMER EMAIL ADDRESS].
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
